Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.description: A wood handled shovel. Handy for digging holes and turning over dirt in your garden.

Glowing-Stone.name: Glowing Stone
Glowing-Stone.description: A smooth flat stone that fits comfortably in the palm of your hand.  The stone emits a pale blue light and feels slightly warm.

Green-Conch.name: Green Conch Shell
Green-Conch.description: A large green conch shell that used to be home to some unknown sea creature.
